entry.title: WIND WARNING, Slave Lake

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 13.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 early this afternoon. High 13. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Sunday 9 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers. Low zero. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers late this evening and after midnight. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming west 60 gusting to 90 late this evening. Low zero. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Sunday 9 April 2023
